trans-unit.source: Provides access to tracking data maintained in a SQL database by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService" /> for a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Dá acesso aos dados de acompanhamento mantidos em um banco de dados SQL por <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService" /> para uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects are returned by a call to both <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and provide access to the tracking data maintained in a SQL database by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> for a specific workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objetos são retornados por uma chamada para ambos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e fornecer acesso aos dados de rastreamento mantidos em um banco de dados SQL do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> para uma instância de fluxo de trabalho específico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> class optimizes its access to the database for its properties, which maintain collections.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> classe otimiza o acesso ao banco de dados para suas propriedades, que mantêm a coleções.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain information about all <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects contained in a list of displayed workflows.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como obter informações sobre todos os <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> exibidos de objetos contidos em uma lista de fluxos de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable.
trans-unit.target: O código cria um `ListViewItem` para cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> encontrado em um `displayedWorkflows` variável.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> contains a string representation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> contém uma representação de cadeia de caracteres da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A>, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowType%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, adiciona o item para um `workflowStatusList`.

trans-unit.source: The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Initialized%2A> property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`.
trans-unit.target: O código usa os valores de propriedade nomeada anteriormente e uma versão de cadeia de caracteres do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Initialized%2A> propriedade para criar um novo `WorkflowStatusInfo` objeto também é adicionado para o `workflowStatusList`.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte da amostra do SDK do Monitor de fluxo de trabalho do arquivo Mainform.cs.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Monitor de fluxo de trabalho](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of activity tracking records that have been sent for this workflow instance to a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService" /> database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de registros de acompanhamento de atividade que foram enviados para esta instância de fluxo de trabalho para um banco de dados <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService" /> pela infraestrutura de acompanhamento de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> objects sent for this workflow instance to the tracking database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: A lista de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> objetos enviados para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho para o banco de dados de rastreamento pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A> contains all activity tracking records sent for this workflow instance up to the current time; if <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A> contains the activity tracking records sent up until the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> é `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A> contém todas as atividades de controle registros enviados para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho até o momento atual; se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> é `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A> contém a atividade de controle registros enviados até o último <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A> contains activity tracking records sent to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A> contém registros enviados para um banco de dados pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução para esta instância de fluxo de trabalho de monitoramento de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Activity tracking records are sent by the workflow run-time engine tracking infrastructure only when the workflow instance emits an activity status event that corresponds to an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the instance.
trans-unit.target: Registros de atividade de controle são enviados pelo mecanismo de tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho infra-estrutura de rastreamento somente quando a instância de fluxo de trabalho emite um evento de status de atividade que corresponde a um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> especificado no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> para a instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether property data for this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> should be automatically updated when it is accessed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se os dados de propriedade para este <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> devem ser atualizados automaticamente quando forem acessados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if property data should be automatically refreshed when it is accessed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se os dados de propriedade devem ser atualizados automaticamente quando ele é acessado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: To optimize database performance, properties that maintain collections of queried data, such as <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A>, query the database for new elements only when the property is accessed, and the collection for such a property is only updated on an as-required basis when the property is accessed.
trans-unit.target: Para otimizar o desempenho do banco de dados, propriedades que mantêm a coleções de dados consultados, como <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A>, consulta o banco de dados novos elementos apenas quando a propriedade for acessada e a coleção para essa propriedade só é atualizada em uma base como necessário quando a propriedade for acessada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> class maintains two timestamps for each property: one that indicates the time that tracking data for the collection was last loaded, and another that indicates the last time the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> was refreshed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> classe mantém dois carimbos de hora para cada propriedade: um que indica a hora em que os dados para a coleção de controle foi carregado, e outra que indica a última vez que o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> foi atualizado.

trans-unit.source: When you get one of the collection properties, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> loads any tracking data that was added to the database between the last time tracking data for the collection was loaded and the last time the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> was refreshed and adds this data to the collection maintained by the property.
trans-unit.target: Quando você recebe uma das propriedades de coleção, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> carrega quaisquer dados de rastreamento que foi adicionados ao banco de dados entre a última vez em que os dados de controle para a coleção foi carregada e a última vez que o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> foi atualizado e adiciona esses dados para a coleção mantida pela propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The timestamp that indicates the last time data was loaded for the property is then set to the value of the timestamp that indicates the last refresh.
trans-unit.target: O carimbo de hora que indica que os última vez que dados foi carregados para a propriedade, em seguida, é definido como o valor de carimbo de hora que indica a última atualização.

trans-unit.source: If these two timestamps are equal, additional tracking data is not loaded for the property when it is accessed.
trans-unit.target: Se esses dois carimbos de hora são iguais, mais dados de rastreamento não será carregado para a propriedade quando ele é acessado.

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> to `true` to perform a refresh every time a collection property is accessed and ensure that the tracking data returned in the collection maintained by that property is always current.
trans-unit.target: Definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> para `true` para executar uma atualização sempre que uma propriedade de coleção é acessada e certifique-se de que os dados de rastreamento retornados da coleção mantida por propriedade está sempre atualizada.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, you must call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A> to reset the timestamp that corresponds to the last refresh.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> é `false`, você deve chamar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A> para redefinir o carimbo de hora que corresponde à última atualização.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that indicates the time at which the first <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel" /> for this workflow instance was requested by the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que indica a hora em que o primeiro <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel" /> para esta instância de fluxo de trabalho foi solicitado pelo mecanismo de tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that indicates the time at which the first <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel" /> for this workflow instance was requested by the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que indica a hora em que a primeira <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel" /> para este fluxo de trabalho instância foi solicitada pelo mecanismo de tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain information about all <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects contained in a list of displayed workflows.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como obter informações sobre todos os <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> exibidos de objetos contidos em uma lista de fluxos de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable.
trans-unit.target: O código cria um `ListViewItem` para cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> encontrado em um `displayedWorkflows` variável.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> contains a string representation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> contém uma representação de cadeia de caracteres da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A>, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowType%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, adiciona o item para um `workflowStatusList`.

trans-unit.source: The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Initialized%2A> property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`.
trans-unit.target: O código usa os valores de propriedade nomeada anteriormente e uma versão de cadeia de caracteres do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Initialized%2A> propriedade para criar um novo `WorkflowStatusInfo` objeto também é adicionado para o `workflowStatusList`.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte da amostra do SDK do Monitor de fluxo de trabalho do arquivo Mainform.cs.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Monitor de fluxo de trabalho](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects that correspond to workflows that have been invoked by this workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> que correspondem aos fluxos de trabalho que foram invocados por este fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objects that correspond to workflows that have been invoked by this workflow.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> objetos que correspondem aos fluxos de trabalho que foi invocados por este fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.InvokedWorkflows%2A> contains a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> for each of the workflow instances that has been invoked by this workflow instance up to the current time; if <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.InvokedWorkflows%2A> contains a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> for each of the workflow instances that has been invoked by this workflow instance up until the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> é `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.InvokedWorkflows%2A> contém um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> para instâncias de cada fluxo de trabalho que foi chamado por esta instância de fluxo de trabalho até o momento atual; se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> é `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.InvokedWorkflows%2A> contém um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> para instâncias de cada fluxo de trabalho que foi chamado por esta instância de fluxo de trabalho até o último <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo dessa propriedade é determinado pelos dados de rastreamento para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho no banco de dados SQL gerenciado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.

trans-unit.source: This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Dados de controle correspondem ao acompanhamento de registros que são enviados pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução para rastreamento de eventos que são especificados pelos pontos de controle no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associado a esta instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance that invoked this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> da instância do fluxo de trabalho que invocou a esta instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance that invoked this workflow instance or an empty <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> if this workflow instance was not invoked by another workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> da instância do fluxo de trabalho que invocou essa instância de fluxo de trabalho ou vazio <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> se esta instância de fluxo de trabalho não foi invocada por outra instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo dessa propriedade é determinado pelos dados de rastreamento para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho no banco de dados SQL gerenciado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.

trans-unit.source: This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Dados de controle correspondem ao acompanhamento de registros que são enviados pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução para rastreamento de eventos que são especificados pelos pontos de controle no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associado a esta instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Updates the property data for this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza os dados de propriedade para este <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A> does not actually load any data for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A> não carregar, na verdade, todos os dados para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>.

trans-unit.source: To optimize database performance, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> class loads data for its collection properties on an as-required basis.
trans-unit.target: Para otimizar o desempenho do banco de dados, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> carrega dados para suas propriedades de coleção em uma base como necessário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> class maintains two timestamps for each property: one that indicates the time that tracking data for the collection was last loaded, and another that indicates the last time the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> was refreshed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> classe mantém dois carimbos de hora para cada propriedade: um que indica a hora em que os dados para a coleção de controle foi carregado, e outra que indica a última vez que o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> foi atualizado.

trans-unit.source: When you get one of the collection properties, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> loads any tracking data that was added to the database between the last time tracking data for the collection was loaded and the last time the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> was refreshed and adds this data to the collection maintained by the property.
trans-unit.target: Quando você recebe uma das propriedades de coleção, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> carrega quaisquer dados de rastreamento que foi adicionados ao banco de dados entre a última vez em que os dados de controle para a coleção foi carregada e a última vez que o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> foi atualizado e adiciona esses dados para a coleção mantida pela propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The timestamp that indicates the last time data was loaded for the property is then set to the value of the timestamp that indicates the last refresh.
trans-unit.target: O carimbo de hora que indica que os última vez que dados foi carregados para a propriedade, em seguida, é definido como o valor de carimbo de hora que indica a última atualização.

trans-unit.source: If these two timestamps are equal, additional tracking data is not loaded for the property when it is accessed.
trans-unit.target: Se esses dois carimbos de hora são iguais, mais dados de rastreamento não será carregado para a propriedade quando ele é acessado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A> sets the timestamp that corresponds to the last refresh to <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A> Define o carimbo de hora que corresponde ao último atualização <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the status of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o status da instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> that represents the current status of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus" /> que representa o status atual da instância do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> is determined based on the tracking data for the workflow instance, specifically on the workflow tracking records sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure; therefore <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> depends, in part, on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> objects in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> é determinado com base nos dados de rastreamento para a instância de fluxo de trabalho, especificamente no fluxo de trabalho enviados pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução; os registros de controle Portanto, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> depende, em parte, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> objetos no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> para a instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> in each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> maps to one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> em cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> mapeado para um o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> valores.

trans-unit.source: If no workflow tracking records have been sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> is <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus.Created>.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum registro de controle de fluxo de trabalho foram enviado pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução para esta instância de fluxo de trabalho, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> é <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus.Created>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain information about all <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects contained in a list of displayed workflows.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como obter informações sobre todos os <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> exibidos de objetos contidos em uma lista de fluxos de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable.
trans-unit.target: O código cria um `ListViewItem` para cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> encontrado em um `displayedWorkflows` variável.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> contains a string representation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> contém uma representação de cadeia de caracteres da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A>, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowType%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, adiciona o item para um `workflowStatusList`.

trans-unit.source: The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Initialized%2A> property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`.
trans-unit.target: O código usa os valores de propriedade nomeada anteriormente e uma versão de cadeia de caracteres do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Initialized%2A> propriedade para criar um novo `WorkflowStatusInfo` objeto também é adicionado para o `workflowStatusList`.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte da amostra do SDK do Monitor de fluxo de trabalho do arquivo Mainform.cs.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Monitor de fluxo de trabalho](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of user tracking records that have been sent for this workflow instance to a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService" /> database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de registros de acompanhamento de usuário que foram enviados para esta instância de fluxo de trabalho para um banco de dados <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService" /> pela infraestrutura de acompanhamento de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord" /> objects sent for this workflow instance to the tracking database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: A lista de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord" /> objetos enviados para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho para o banco de dados de rastreamento pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.UserEvents%2A> contains all user tracking records sent for this workflow instance up to the current time; if <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.UserEvents%2A> contains the user tracking records sent up until the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> é `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.UserEvents%2A> contém todos os usuários de controle registros enviados para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho até o momento atual; se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> é `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.UserEvents%2A> contém o usuário controle registros enviados até o último <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.UserEvents%2A> contains user tracking records sent to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.UserEvents%2A> contém registros enviados para um banco de dados pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução para esta instância de fluxo de trabalho de controle de usuário.

trans-unit.source: User tracking records are sent by the workflow run-time engine tracking infrastructure only when the workflow instance emits a user event that corresponds to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the instance.
trans-unit.target: Registros de controle de usuário são enviados pelo mecanismo de tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho infra-estrutura de rastreamento somente quando a instância de fluxo de trabalho emite um evento de usuário que corresponde a um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> especificado no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> para a instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that represents the current workflow definition for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que representa a definição de fluxo de trabalho atual para a instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that represents the current workflow definition for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que representa a definição de fluxo de trabalho atual para a instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo dessa propriedade é determinado pelos dados de rastreamento para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho no banco de dados SQL gerenciado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.

trans-unit.source: This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Dados de controle correspondem ao acompanhamento de registros que são enviados pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução para rastreamento de eventos que são especificados pelos pontos de controle no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associado a esta instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workflow has been updated since the last time <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowDefinition" /> was loaded.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o fluxo de trabalho foi atualizado desde a última vez que <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowDefinition" /> foi carregado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workflow has been updated; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o fluxo de trabalho tiver sido atualizado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo dessa propriedade é determinado pelos dados de rastreamento para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho no banco de dados SQL gerenciado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.

trans-unit.source: This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Dados de controle correspondem ao acompanhamento de registros que são enviados pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução para rastreamento de eventos que são especificados pelos pontos de controle no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associado a esta instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of workflow tracking records that have been sent for this workflow instance to a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService" /> database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de registros de acompanhamento de fluxo de trabalho que foram enviados para esta instância de fluxo de trabalho para um banco de dados <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService" /> pela infraestrutura de acompanhamento de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord" /> objects sent for this workflow instance to the tracking database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: A lista de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord" /> objetos enviados para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho para o banco de dados de rastreamento pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents%2A> contains all workflow tracking records sent for this workflow instance up to the current time; if <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents%2A> contains the workflow tracking records sent up until the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> é `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents%2A> contém todos os de fluxo de trabalho de controle registros enviados para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho até o momento atual; se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> é `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents%2A> contém o fluxo de trabalho controle registros enviados até o último <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents%2A> contains workflow tracking records sent to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents%2A> contém registros enviados para um banco de dados pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução para esta instância de fluxo de trabalho de controle de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Workflow tracking records are sent by the workflow run-time engine tracking infrastructure only when the workflow instance emits a workflow status event that corresponds to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the instance.
trans-unit.target: Registros de controle de fluxo de trabalho são enviados pelo mecanismo de tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho infra-estrutura de rastreamento somente quando a instância de fluxo de trabalho emite um evento de status do fluxo de trabalho que corresponde a um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> especificado no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> para a instância.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance for which this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> applies.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> da instância do fluxo de trabalho para a qual o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> se aplica.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance for which this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> applies.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> da instância do fluxo de trabalho para a qual o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance" /> se aplica.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain information about all <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects contained in a list of displayed workflows.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como obter informações sobre todos os <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> exibidos de objetos contidos em uma lista de fluxos de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable.
trans-unit.target: O código cria um `ListViewItem` para cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> encontrado em um `displayedWorkflows` variável.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> contains a string representation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> contém uma representação de cadeia de caracteres da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A>, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowType%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, adiciona o item para um `workflowStatusList`.

trans-unit.source: The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Initialized%2A> property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`.
trans-unit.target: O código usa os valores de propriedade nomeada anteriormente e uma versão de cadeia de caracteres do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Initialized%2A> propriedade para criar um novo `WorkflowStatusInfo` objeto também é adicionado para o `workflowStatusList`.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte da amostra do SDK do Monitor de fluxo de trabalho do arquivo Mainform.cs.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Monitor de fluxo de trabalho](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a number that can be used to find related records in separate views for this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um número que pode ser usado para localizar registros relacionados nas exibições separadas para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A number that can be used to find related records in separate views for this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um número que pode ser usado para localizar registros relacionados nas exibições separadas para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This is an internal join operation.
trans-unit.target: Esta é uma operação de junção interna.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A> provides a more efficient way to access data for a workflow instance in a SQL database than by using a workflow instance <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A> Fornece uma maneira mais eficiente para acessar dados para uma instância de fluxo de trabalho em um banco de dados SQL usando uma instância de fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Guid>.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A> to find related records for this workflow instance in separate views.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A> para localizar registros relacionados para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho nos modos de exibição separadas.

trans-unit.source: It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, adiciona o item para um `workflowStatusList`.
